title: Cap Height
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20120701165309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20120701165309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Cap Height**

The height of [capital](http://web.archive.org/web/20120701165309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/capital) letters, as measured from the [baseline](http://web.archive.org/web/20120701165309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/baseline) to the top of a [majuscule](http://web.archive.org/web/20120701165309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/majuscule) character.
author: track and kern
